examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: alexa-skill-wot
en-US.description:
Ask for Wheel of Time Character Facts.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Wheel of Time Character Dictionary" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
